column1: Kata Robata////So impressed by this place!! Definitely my favorite meal I've had in the times I have visited Houston. The sushi was sooo fresh
column2: the lobster Mac and cheese was so dreamy and I have been waiting to try a wagyu katsu sand which and the flavors were insane!! Such a delicious meal
column3: and the service was great. From the hosts
column4: to server to food runners everyone was so friendly and made sure we were enjoying our meals. Can't wait to get back here and eat some more!
